level.text: The Mayor shall, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, issue proposed rules, including a schedule of civil fines, to implement the provisions of this chapter.
The Mayor may issue emergency rules, which shall be effective no more than 90 days and which shall be consistent with subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 7-182
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-182, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 44-201.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of authority pursuant to D.C. Law 7-182, see Mayor's Order 89-211, September 15, 1989.
